long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Very simple counter. Can be used for counting in the browser. Press "D" or "+" or press the +Button on the screen, to increment by 1. Press "A" or "-" or press the -Button on the screen, to decrement by 1. Press "S" or "enter" or Reset-button on the screen, to reset the counter. It's a simple way to count something when you're on websites or just browsing.
